title: LGR Utilities with FloPy - Local Grid Refinement Tools
description: Demonstrates FloPy's Local Grid Refinement (LGR) utilities for creating refined grids within parent grids. Shows grid refinement calculations, parent-child relationships, and conversion to DISV format.

package_details.LGR: Local Grid Refinement utility class for nested grids
package_details.DISV: Conversion to discretization by vertices format

grid_details.disv_conversion: Convert refined grid to unstructured format

key_features: Exchange data generation for grid connections
DISV format conversion for unstructured modeling
No MODFLOW execution - pure utility functions
learning_objectives: Converting refined grids to DISV format
Generating exchange data for grid connections
